description: When we first spoke to Chico on the phone, there was horniness to his voice we had never quite heard before that said unmistakably, this guy was born to be in front of our cameras. When we said he had a friend who was interested too, we couldn't get them here fast enough. Like Chico, Jay-R was another over-sexed Latin boy that Miami is famous for.  It wasn't until we started filming that learned not only were these two friends, they were cousins as well. As for that horniness we detected in Chico's voice...that proved to be an understatement. It wasn't they couldn't wait to get undressed and down to business, not being able to stand it another second before they ripped their clothes off each other and started working those thick uncut dicks is more like it! This obviously wasn't the first time they have been around each other naked and from the size of the loads they bust, it won't be the last either.
title: Kissing Cousins, Scene #01
